events.title: Haunted Halloween Hunt 2020
events.description: Families, join our small businesses for a scavenger hunt full of riddles, treats, & spooky fun surprises!

events.title: Fourth of July Raffle 2021 - Winning Numbers
events.description: Congratulations to all the winners of our 4th of July Raffle! Come on in to Darty’s with your winning ticket to claim your prize of a $10 Darty’s gift card! Reminder: All orders for Candy Grapes are now ready for pickup in store!

events.title: Fourth of July Raffle 2021
events.description: Make sure to Stop by Darty’s this week to participate in our 4th of July Raffle!

events.title: Halloween Challenge
events.description: Come and shop at the Eats & Treats AG pop up shop today. Bring your friends, we will have taste testing, a variety of kid friendly “mock-tails” and an assortment of snacks and goodies!

events.title: Halloween Hours
events.description: Come and shop at the Eats & Treats AG pop up shop today. Bring your friends, we will have taste testing, a variety of kid friendly “mock-tails” and an assortment of snacks and goodies!

events.title: Eats & Treats AG Pop-Up Shop
events.description: Come and shop at the Eats & Treats AG pop up shop today. Bring your friends, we will have taste testing, a variety of kid friendly “mock-tails” and an assortment of snacks and goodies!

events.title: Nacho Night
events.description: Join us this Friday, 12/10 for a Nacho Night with @eatsandtreatsbyag!

events.title: Eats and Treats by AG $30 Valentines Special
events.description: Chocolate-covered strawberries is a popular gift this time of the year. If your looking for a source, we got you! Pick-up will be Saturday morning- Sunday afternoon. Give us a call with any questions! (224)888-4496 or send us a message and we\’ll get to you within 6-12hrs. From our hearts to yours, thanks for supporting local!

events.title: Ice Cream Fest 2022
events.description: I scream, you scream, we all scream for Ice Cream!! Bring the whole family to Ice Cream Fest 2022! Thanks for supporting local!
